title: Unable to connect/Disconnected from active game.
body:
Hey Riot; 
You guys blocking internode/iinet traffic and Adam internet traffic?

We all just got Dc\ed at once and are now getting a firewall error, Shop and Lobby still work fine we just can't join games after they start. 

Error: 
Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and try again.

replies.body: Same thing happened to me ðŸ˜­
